bewisclient.color.changing.description: A color that changes over time, cycling through the spectrum based on the speed set.
bewisclient.color.static.description: A static color that does not change.
bewisclient.menu.better_visibility.nethe: Improve visibility in the Nether dimension
bewisclient.menu.block_highlight.color.d: Change the color of the block highlight
bewisclient.menu.block_highlight.thickne: Adjust the thickness of the block highlight
bewisclient.menu.fullbright.brightness.d: Adjust the brightness level. 0.0 to 1.0 are the normal levels, while 1.0 to 15.0 is lighting up the world according to the brightness level
bewisclient.menu.fullbright.night_vision: Allows you to have the visual effect of night vision without actually having it
bewisclient.menu.held_item_tooltip.max_s: Maximum number of lines to show in the held item tooltip
bewisclient.menu.held_item_tooltip.multi: Select which information to show in the held item tooltip
bewisclient.menu.scoreboard.scale.descri: Adjust the size of the scoreboard
bewisclient.menu.widget.background.descr: Set the color and opacity of the widget
bewisclient.menu.widget.border.descripti: Set the color and opacity of the widget's border
bewisclient.menu.widget.border_radius.de: Set the radius of the widget's border corners
bewisclient.menu.widget.coordinates_widg: Shows how your coordinates will change if you move forward
bewisclient.menu.widget.default_backgrou: Set the default color and opacity of a widget
bewisclient.menu.widget.default_border.d: Set the default color and opacity of a widget's border
bewisclient.menu.widget.default_border_r: Set the default radius of a widget's border corners
bewisclient.menu.widget.default_line_spa: Set the default spacing between lines of text in a widget
bewisclient.menu.widget.default_padding_: Set the default padding at the edge of a widget to the text
bewisclient.menu.widget.default_scale.de: Set the default scale of a widget
bewisclient.menu.widget.default_text_col: Set the default color of the text in a widget
bewisclient.menu.widget.default_text_sha: Set whether text in a widget has a shadow by default
bewisclient.menu.widget.gap.description: Set the gap between widgets in a row
bewisclient.menu.widget.line_spacing.des: Set the spacing between lines of text in the widget
bewisclient.menu.widget.padding_size.des: Set the padding at the edge of the widget to the text
bewisclient.menu.widget.pressed_backgrou: Set the color and opacity of the widget when a key is pressed
bewisclient.menu.widget.pressed_border.d: Set the color and opacity of the widget's border when a key is pressed
bewisclient.menu.widget.pressed_text_col: Set the color of the text in the widget when a key is pressed
bewisclient.menu.widget.scale.descriptio: Set the scale of the widget
bewisclient.menu.widget.screen_edge_dist: Set the snapping distance of a widget to the screen edge
bewisclient.menu.widget.text_color.descr: Set the color of the text in the widget
bewisclient.menu.widget.text_shadow.desc: Set whether text in the widget has a shadow
bewisclient.menu.zoom.instant.descriptio: Disables the transition animation when zooming in or out
bewisclient.menu.zoom.smooth.description: Enable or disable smooth zoom (Works as if smooth camera is enabled)
bewisclient.popup.add_widget.title: Add Widget
bewisclient.widget.biome_widget.descript: Displays the current biome at your position.
bewisclient.widget.biome_widget.name: Biome Widget
bewisclient.widget.coordinates_widget.de: Displays your current coordinates in the world
bewisclient.widget.cps_widget.descriptio: Displays your current clicks per second (CPS).
bewisclient.widget.cps_widget.name: CPS Widget
bewisclient.widget.day_widget.name: Day Widget
bewisclient.widget.daytime_widget.descri: Displays the current in-game time in hours and minutes.
bewisclient.widget.daytime_widget.name: Daytime Widget
bewisclient.widget.fps_widget.descriptio: Displays your current frames per second (FPS).
bewisclient.widget.fps_widget.name: FPS Widget
bewisclient.widget.inventory_widget.desc: Displays your inventory on the screen.
bewisclient.widget.inventory_widget.name: Inventory Widget
bewisclient.widget.key_widget.descriptio: Displays your movement and jump keys.
bewisclient.widget.key_widget.name: Key Widget
bewisclient.widget.ping_widget.descripti: Displays your current ping in milliseconds (ms).
bewisclient.widget.ping_widget.name: Ping Widget
bewisclient.widget.speed_widget.descript: Displays your current speed in blocks per second.
bewisclient.widget.speed_widget.name: Speed Widget
